Exclusive: US explored adding more cobalt to defence stockpiles, sources sayThe U.S. looked into buying cobalt for defence stockpiles last year, three sources with knowledge of the matter said, adding the Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) could consider purchases in future despite deciding against them in its latest plan. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:04:49 GMT Q5MTCTQQNROAXOU3P6UX76MJLU https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/us-explored-adding-more-cobalt-defence-stockpiles-sources-say-2024-03-18/Pratima Desai市场商品
China's regulator to ban Evergrande chairman from entering securities market for lifeChina's securities regulator has fined China Evergrande Group's chairman Hui Ka Yan, and plans to ban him from entering the country's securities market for life over a series of rule violations, the company's flagship unit Hengda Real Estate said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:59:22 GMT J6NUDYP4P5I7HHVJ7X2PEISHKE https://www.reuters.com/business/chinas-regulator-bans-ever-great-chairman-entering-securities-market-life-2024-03-18/Reuters商业
West decries Putin's landslide election win, China congratulates himWestern governments lined up on Monday to condemn Vladimir Putin's landslide election victory as unfair and undemocratic, but China and North Korea congratulated the veteran Russian leader on extending his rule by a further six years. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:53:08 GMT G4CUPH6R6VNPZFUZ53NJYLK7UA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/west-decries-putin-landslide-election-win-china-congratulates-him-2024-03-18/Matthias Williams世界欧洲
N.Korea leader Kim Jong Un congratulates Putin on re-electionNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un on Monday congratulated Russian President Vladimir Putin for his re-election, saying Pyongyang would work together with him to further develop bilateral relations. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:41:13 GMT LYMWBKXSKVPAFLDYSPWAMEQS7E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/korean-leader-kim-jong-un-congratulates-putin-on-re-election-2024-03-18/Cynthia Kim世界欧洲
China protests Taiwan minister's role at Seoul summit backed by U.S.China rebuked South Korea on Monday for Taiwan's participation in a U.S.-backed democracy summit in Seoul, where the island's Digital Minister Audrey Tang delivered an unannounced video message. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:09:56 GMT LIBL2PTMYVI4XNU3OQBX7QZ6PY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-protests-taiwan-ministers-role-seoul-summit-backed-by-us-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
Morning Bid: Rates, oil lifted by China's green shootsA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:09:23 GMT OYFRAOZ2JFJOXFUMZA7NAWPJ3M https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-03-18/Reuters市场美国市场
China's military, state media slam U.S. after Reuters report on SpaceX spy satellitesChinese military and state-run media on Sunday accused the United States of threatening global security, days after a Reuters report which found Elon Musk's SpaceX was building hundreds of spy satellites for a U.S. intelligence agency. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:33:57 GMT X6HAOY6SLNIVPMKPNPJVIQDD2A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-military-state-media-slam-us-after-reuters-report-spacex-spy-satellites-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中国
China's Xi congratulates Putin on win, set to develop their tiesChinese President Xi Jinping on Monday congratulated Vladimir Putin on winning another term as Russia's president and said China was set to maintain close communication with Russia to promote their partnership, according to Chinese state media. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:07:04 GMT 36322DTIDRNEREAXZNBR4O6E5M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/china-congratulates-putin-on-election-win-says-ties-will-strengthen-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
More Chinese tied the knot in 2023, lifting marriage rates for first time in nine yearsThe number of new marriages in China jumped 12.4% in 2023 from a year earlier, reversing a downtrend that has lasted for almost a decade as more youth tied the knot after delaying their nuptials due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:04:54 GMT 6CVFAPMZQNMD5BTZ4GRPWJI5LA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-chinese-tied-knot-2023-lifting-marriage-rates-first-time-nine-years-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中国
China considers taking part in Swiss Ukraine peace talks, ambassador saysChina will consider taking part in a peace conference aimed at ending the war in Ukraine which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, the Asian country's ambassador to Bern was quoted as saying on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:03:16 GMT CC3YS42AVBOD3KZXNKHFQ34QKY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-considers-takeing-part-swiss-ukraine-peace-talks-ambassador-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
